casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Antonia MILLER 2PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Juan Antonia John G. Batherson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Ivy Johnson, Ian Mance, Attorneys at Law, for Beloved Community Center of Greensboro

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of October 2017 by State of NC to Amend the Record:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
